mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les considerations des quatre mondes, à sauoir est: diuin, angelique, celeste, & sensible: comprinses en quatre centuries de quatrains, contenans la cresme de diuine & humaine philosophie / Par Guillaume De La Perriere Tolosan
Considerations des qvatre mondes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bonhomme, Macé, active 1536-1569
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
La Perrière, Guillaume de, 1499-1565
Trautz, Georges, 1808-1879
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: A-P⁸ (leaves P7 and P8 are blank)
Text within ornamental borders, some with initials I.M. or I.P.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Bookplates of Robert Hoe and Lucius Wilmerding. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. GOrdon list, 16. Last blank leaf wanting in this copy.
